misty.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: misty weather is weather with a lot of mist
misty.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: if your eyes are misty, they are full of tears, especially because you are remembering a time in the past
misty.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: He paused, his eyes growing misty.
Whenever Maria sees a picture of her mother, she gets misty-eyed.
misty.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: Without my glasses everything is just a misty blur.
